visual.name: cdTimelines
visual.description: Visualize dates and ranges as timelines.

dataRoles.description: Link to open by clicking a data point.
dataRoles.name: link

Licensing.description: Enable licensed features and enter a license key.

Appearance.description: Control the appearance of the visual.

todayBar.description: Enable or disable the today bar.

strokeEnabled.description: Enable or disable the stroke (lining) of a data bar.

noDataText.description: Text to be displayed when the visual contains no data.

fgColor.description: Select color of the pattern line (stroke).

patternSize.description: Size of a single pattern element.

fontFamily.description: Select font family for the overlay.

floatingLegend.description: Is legend fixed (all times at same position) or before the data elements.

legendFontFamily.description: Select font family for the legend.

Axes.description: Modify the appearance and behavior of axes

yAxisFontFamily.description: Select font family for the entity (y-axis)

xAxisFontFamily.description: Select font family for the x-axis.

xtickcount.description: How many ticks should x-axis show. (Just a hint, not definitive).

xAxisDateFormat.description: Control how the dates (and times) are shown in X-Axis.

xAxisCustomDateFormat.description: Custom date format for x-axis dates. Allowed tokens: https://moment.github.io/luxon/docs/manual/formatting.html#table-of-tokens

floatingXAxis.description: Is x-axis always at the bottom of the visual or after the data.

selectionToolType.description: Select which selection tool to use.

enumeration.displayName: Brush - select by drawing a box

entity_single_category.description: Enable / disable selection of current entitys current colors.

entity_all_categories.description: Enable / disable selection of all colors of current entity

all_entities_single_category.description: Enable / disable of all entities of current color.

time_before.description: Enable / disable selection of all elements before current.

time_after.description: Enable / disable selection of all elements after current.

time_overlap.description: Enable / disable selection of overlapping (time) elements.

time_non_overlap.description: Enable / disable selection of items which do not overlap (time).

multiselect_adds.description: Whether clicking new item adds to current selection.

Draw.description: Control the drawing of the visual.

drawBatchSize.description: How many items are drawn at one. Small value = more responsive.

datesHaveNoTimes.description: Does data - start and end - how only data portion. Start role's time is set to 00:00:00. End role's to 23:59:59.
